__TOC__

* In the LAMP installation, there are problems in the my.cnf file for MYSQL. It is something like listen 172.0.0.1 whereas it should be listen <IP_OF_COMPUTER>. This should be configured automatically.
* There should be a FLAMPS (FTP (vsftpd), Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, SSH (OpenSSH)) installation option.
